    HasCollision, HasCombat, HasHealth, HasStats, StatListener, HasPhysicsBox, HasLevel, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, java.lang.Iterable<StatType>

    public class EliteMob
extends WarriorMob
    A more advanced mob sprite with better AI (faster, stronger)
